Using pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and SciPy, I‚Äôve transformed complex datasets into an interactive 3D plot that reveals the hidden patterns in geological resistivity. üìà<br>

# üîé Key Highlights:

- Interpolated geospatial data over a fine-tuned grid.
- Visualized multiple strata with precise contour mapping.
